name: Mina Protocol (httpz) 🪶
fullText:
🕹️ ZK Arcade is coming soon — and we’re giving the Mina community early access!

We’ve teamed up with @alignedlayer + @Nori_ZK to reward early zk builders + testers. 
If you joined Nori’s first ETH→Mina bridge testnet, this one’s for you 💫

Like & RT this post, then register 👇 https://t.co/nASbrZuKLz
